name: Finch Lemongrass Powder
description: Finch Lemongrass Powder is indispensable for making famous and beautiful dishes like Green Thai Curry, and many more authentic Thai, Sri Lankan, Japanese, Far Eastern, and Pacific-region cuisine. Try it with ginger, garlic, chili, citrus fruits, pineapple, and in smoothies. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
